traits.locale_text: Ваш отряд понес большие потери и был вынужден несколько месяцев скрываться на восставшем против Империума мире, чудовищные условия выживания в этот период ослабили вас.

languages.text: Вы угодили в руки пиратов, желавших знать маршруты доставки десятины. Вы чудом выжили, однако пытки искалечили вас навсегда.
You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.
languages.original_text: Вы угодили в руки пиратов, желавших знать маршруты доставки десятины. Вы чудом выжили, однако пытки искалечили вас навсегда.

traits.locale_text: You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You barely survived, but you never fully recovered from the torture.
You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You barely survived, but you never fully recovered from the torture.
You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.
You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.
You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.
You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.

languages.text: Du wurdest von Piraten gefangen genommen, die Informationen über Zehntrouten wollten. Du hast überlebt, dich aber nie vollständig von der Folter erholt.
languages.original_text: You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.

traits.locale_text: Du wurdest von Piraten gefangen genommen, die Informationen über Zehntrouten wollten. Du hast überlebt, dich aber nie vollständig von der Folter erholt.

languages.text: Vous avez été {mf|capturé|capturée} par des pirates qui cherchaient à obtenir des informations sur les itinéraires de transport de la dîme. Bien que vous ayez réussi à survivre, vous ne vous êtes jamais totalement {mf|remis|remise} de la torture qu'ils vous ont infligée.
languages.original_text: You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez été {mf|capturé|capturée} par des pirates qui cherchaient à obtenir des informations sur les itinéraires de transport de la dîme. Bien que vous ayez réussi à survivre, vous ne vous êtes jamais totalement {mf|remis|remise} de la torture qu'ils vous ont infligée.

languages.text: 你被海盗俘虏，他们想从你嘴里撬出什一税运输路线的消息。尽管到最后你活了下来，但始终都未能从那场严刑逼供中彻底恢复。
languages.original_text: You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.

traits.locale_text: 你被海盗俘虏，他们想从你嘴里撬出什一税运输路线的消息。尽管到最后你活了下来，但始终都未能从那场严刑逼供中彻底恢复。

languages.text: Te capturaron unos piratas que querían información sobre las rutas de transporte del diezmo. Sobreviviste, pero nunca te recuperaste del todo de la tortura.
languages.original_text: You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.

traits.locale_text: Te capturaron unos piratas que querían información sobre las rutas de transporte del diezmo. Sobreviviste, pero nunca te recuperaste del todo de la tortura.

languages.text: あなたは租税の輸送ルートに関する情報を知りたがっている海賊に捕らえられた。何とか生き延びたものの、その拷問から完全には回復していない。
languages.original_text: You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.

traits.locale_text: あなたは租税の輸送ルートに関する情報を知りたがっている海賊に捕らえられた。何とか生き延びたものの、その拷問から完全には回復していない。

languages.text: Aşar nakliye rotaları hakkında bilgi edinmek isteyen korsanların eline düştün. Mucizevi bir şekilde hayatta kalsan da gördüğün işkence sende derin izler bıraktı.
languages.original_text: You were captured by pirates who wanted information on tithe transportation routes. You managed to survive, but you never fully recovered from the torture.

traits.locale_text: Aşar nakliye rotaları hakkında bilgi edinmek isteyen korsanların eline düştün. Mucizevi bir şekilde hayatta kalsan da gördüğün işkence sende derin izler bıraktı.
